name: flatMap
signature: { <E, E2>(f: (e: E) => Cause<E2>): (self: Cause<E>) => Cause<E2>; <E, E2>(self: Cause<E>, f: (e: E) => Cause<E2>): Cause<E2>; }
description:
Transforms errors in a `Cause` into new causes.
*Details This function applies a function `f` to each `Fail` error, converting it into
a new `Cause`. This is especially powerful for merging or restructuring error
types while preserving or combining cause information.
documentation:
